faqs.answer: SentinelIS is an open source Information Security Management System. Our goal is to help you maintain and improve your way of protecting your most valuable and sensitive information.

Mimo is your personal chat assistant integrated into SentinelIS. Mimo can help you with configuring requirements, answering questions about information security, and guiding you through the setup process of SentinelIS.
SentinelIS is a feature-rich, open source Information Security Management System that helps organizations manage your information security processes effectively.

questions: What is my company data used for?
What is my data used for?
faqs.answer: SentinelIS is self-hosted, meaning all your data is stored on your own servers. We do not collect or store any of your company data.
